metadata.title: CVE-2021-30184 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Compliant (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: GNU Chess 6.2.7 allows attackers to execute arbitrary code via crafted PGN(Portable Game Notation) data. This is related to a buffer overflow in theuse of a .tmp.epd temporary file in the cmd_pgnload and cmd_pgnreplayfunctions in frontend/cmd.cc.

criterions.comment: gnuchess: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needs-triage').
